column1: Araglas was the son of Chieftain [[Aragorn I]], who was killed by wolves in {{TA
column3: n}}. Araglas' own rule was uneventful. He ruled for 128 years until he died in 2455 and was followed by his son, [[Arahad I]].<ref name="North"/>
